meta.description: List all the Bases of a Workspace
Duplicate a new Base in a Workspace
Update name, icon and color of a Base in the Workspace

workspace_id.text: WorkspaceID to search inside a particular workspace

meta.description: Get all the Bases whose names are matched with the search_string
Get the list of all records and its data for a specific Table in a Base
Update a field's value of a Record in a Table in a Base
Use this API to export the base/table/view

view_id.text: When a view ID is provided, additional information, such as height and visibility, is included in the response

meta.description: Get all the fields and its details for a specific Table in a Base
Add a new field to a Table in a Base
Change name, type and/or type components of the field in a Table
Remove a field from a Table in a Base
Add a new selection option in a Field
Delete the selection option in a Field
Update the name and color of a selection option in a Field

portal_id.text: Portal ID - Mandatory if, import_scope == base

base_id.text: Base ID - Mandatory if, import_scope == table

meta.description: Use this API to import the base/table from the files
List Portals

field_ids_with_values.text: The data that needs to be updated.

values.text: Corresponding Values for fields As Array

meta.description: Add a new record to a Table in a Base
Remove a record from a Table in a Base

data.text: The data that needs to be updated

is_ids_used_in_data.text: By default it is false. Can be set as true if the field is specified by ID in data

criteria.text: If criteria is not set, all available records will get updated

is_ids_used_in_params.text: Can be set as true if the field is specified by ID in criteria

first_match_only.text: If true and if there are multiple records on the specified criteria, records will be updated for first match alone

is_case_sensitive.text: Can be set as false for case-insensitive search

is_upsert_needed.text: Can be set us true if needed

record_ids.text: record IDs as array for updating records with given data

meta.description: Update the records of a Table in the Base, that matches the given criteria or record IDs

view_id.text: When a view ID is provided, additional information, such as height and visibility, is included in the response

criteria.text: If criteria is not set, all available records will get fetched

first_match_only.text: Can be set as false for case-insensitive search

is_case_sensitive.text: Can be set as true if the field is specified by ID in criteria

is_ids_used_in_params.text: Can be set as true if the field is specified by ID in criteria.

reference_record_id.text: Can be set as false for case-insensitive search

record_ids.text: record IDs as array for fetching records

meta.description: Fetch the records of a Table in the Base, that matches the given criteria or record IDs
Get all the tables of a Base

is_duplicate_with_records.text: By default it is true. Can be set as false if you want to duplicate the table without its records
